hadiths.text: Jabir (Allah be pleased with him) reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) flung pebbles at jamra on the Day of Nahr after sunrise, and after that (i. e. on the 11th, 12th and 13th of Dhu'l-Hijja when the sun had declined)

chapter.eng-name: The time when it is recommended to stone the Jamrah
